value: Shalom Shalom Shalom this is the annual
John Lee with tour our restoration
ministries oh my goodness what a day at
PSU first thing I wanted to spell though
because I keep getting these false
accusations on the internet and at PSU
people saying I'm mentally ill folks go
to the Clackamas County Courthouse look
up the records from October thirtieth
2012 there is a state licensed therapist
and Catherine Milt Kerr who saw me for
over a year and she testified under oath
in a court of law under the Honorable
Judge norby but I have absolutely no
mental illnesses so PSU students and
people on the internet stop saying on a
mentally ill I'm not I love yah alright
with that said I got to campus around
noon I began to preach and almost
immediately Andrew it was a very wicked
man you started getting right into my
face and reading all the stuff from
daniel leo and the lies from the other
websites and the false accusations and i
just ignored him for the most part just
started preaching and what was cool is
that this wicked psychologist like lady
came up to andrew and said hey andrew
just don't don't mess with daniel he's
crazy and Andrew listen to him so it's
like yeah used the evil to come against
the evil so that I could just keep
reaching so I just kept exalting Yahshua
his Torah stop sinning stop masturbating
stop looking at pornography stop having
sex outside of marriage stop lying
cheating to turn your heart to Yahshua I
started just exalting the tour on all of
its fullness and this crowd began to
swell I mean I kid you not it got up to
75 100 students and then about halfway
through my preaching this March of about
400 people started coming across psu and
they were marching to try to stop
violence against Ethiopia or something
and I by the spirit i just turned to
them and i stood right in it right in
front of their parade as they were
marching and i said you guys are
preaching against violence against
ethiopia and yet you guys are still
making violence against yah because
you're still sinning what hypocrites and
i just preached against them and then
this huge crowd joined my crowd so now
there's like a crowd of like 500
students and they were trying to have a
rally and then I just started preaching
to them and I said you know this is the
problem of America you guys want to
fight for these so-called righteous
causes like you know standing against
violence against Ethiopia and yet you
yourselves are guilty of sin you
yourselves are guilty of having of
waging violence against yeah because
you're still masturbating lying cheating
stealing and doing all manner of sin and
a lot of the crowd of this rally began
to listen to me and so there was like I
literally had a crowd of like 500 people
at one point and then they eventually
moved away and went on with their thing
I continued to preach Brandon and Joshua
the hypocrites both showed up today it's
like the hypocrites are just gnashing
their teeth Brandon gave me this nice
cup of tea again and I was thankful to
him but then he comes up to me and says
look Daniel looks like you're being
drowned out by this rally which soul
nonsense so I turned him and I said
you're just a hypocrite Brandon just
tried to defeat me so i rebuked him and
I kicked over his tea but I said your
righteousness is as filthy rags and then
the spirit I just had me to start
repeating over and over again over and
over again first John 39 if you love god
you will not sin if you love Yahshua you
will not send you'd rather die than sin
if you truly love yah sure you will not
sin so these Christians got really upset
like this one girl actually there was a
girl who has a grandfather who's a
Messianic Jew I gave him her card but
then she had a friend who came up and
said Daniel are you really showing love
you know and I said where are you
Kristen she says yes and I said well
then why are you disobeying the New
Testament she said what do you mean so
first Corinthians 11 first Thessalonians
5 17 if you're Christian obeying the New
Testament you need to put a feminine
veil over your hair she was like what I
said don't judge me until you start
obeying your own New Testament and i
rebuked her another girl tried to get up
in front of me and she was just to pay
again and but she was revealing a brass
and I said stop dressing like a whore
again I touched on the topic that first
Corinthians was at first Corinthians 9
or first contains six one of those words
basically says that you know women who
have sex outside of marriage are whores
men who have sex outside of marriage or
whoremongers of course they got really
upset about that but then toward the end
the hecklers finally dissipated and I
still had a good-sized crowd of maybe 50
60 even 70 students but there was a more
intimate ring right around me and I
could tell the spirit of yah was falling
upon these people and one guy wanted me
to read out first Corinthians 13 so I
did I read out love what true charity is
that it's not a
feeling but it's an act of the will and
I showed how I love these students and
then I read first John 5 where it says
here by we know what love is though he's
keep his Commandments so it was the
biggest crowd I've ever had I preached
until probably about 130 I was just so
tired because I preached the biggest
crowd I've ever had at psu ever and all
my years of being at PSU I don't think
I've ever preached to 500 people it was
awesome so thank you for your prayers
the revival truly is thundering for that
psu and there's no sign of stopping this
is daniel john lee with tour restoration
ministries websites ww spirit and tour
com I was anointed for such a time as
this
